hero.title: Bringing the Best of Algeria to the World
hero.subtitle: Connecting global markets with the finest sustainable produce from the heart of Algeria's fertile lands.

hero.description: Bridging the gap between premium Algerian agricultural terroir and international markets with excellence, integrity, and logistical mastery.

mission.title: Mission & Vision
mission.subtitle: Our Purpose
mission.mission_content: To showcase the richness of Algerian terroir to the global market through sustainable export practices, empowering local farmers while ensuring global food security.
mission.vision_content: To become the leading bridge for premium Algerian agricultural products worldwide, recognized for quality, reliability, and innovation by 2030.

items.title: Uncompromising Quality
items.description: We adhere to the highest international food safety and quality standards, ensuring every product represents the best of Algeria.

items.title: Full Transparency
items.description: Complete traceability from the farm gate to the final destination, fostering trust with our global partners and customers.

items.title: Logistical Excellence
items.description: Optimized supply chains and state-of-the-art cold chain management to preserve freshness across continents.

history.title: Our Journey Towards 2026
history.subtitle: The Evolution
history.description: Founded with a passion for Algerian agriculture, Made in Bled Trading has rapidly expanded its footprint. Our upcoming "2026 Edition" marks a significant milestone in our expansion into high-tech sustainable packaging and direct-to-retail supply chains in Europe and the Americas.

timeline.title: Foundations
timeline.description: Established roots in the fertile Mitidja plains, specializing in olive oil exports.

timeline.title: Diversification
timeline.description: Expanded to dry fruits and premium Deglet Nour dates, reaching 15 global markets.

timeline.title: The New Horizon
timeline.description: Launching our 2026 Edition: Zero-carbon logistics and blockchain traceability systems.

global_reach.title: Global Reach
global_reach.subtitle: International Presence
global_reach.description: Headquartered in Algiers, our operational network spans across continents, ensuring fresh Algerian produce is never far from your table.

regions.name: Europe
regions.description: Main hubs in Marseille, Hamburg, and Madrid.

regions.name: Africa
regions.description: Pan-African trade routes across the Maghreb and Sub-Saharan regions.

regions.name: Middle East
regions.description: Strategic distribution centers in Dubai and Jeddah.

products.title: Our Product Categories
products.description: MADE IN BLED TRADING is an Algerian company specializing in the export of agricultural and agri-food products, specifically fruits, vegetables, and dates. Our ambition is to connect Algerian expertise to international markets through responsible, structured, and professional trade.

why_us.title: Why Choose MADE IN BLED TRADING?

quality.title: Quality Guarantee
quality.desc: International certification standards ensuring premium taste and safety.

logistics.title: Logistics Expertise
logistics.desc: Efficient global distribution network with climate-controlled storage.

price.title: Competitive Pricing
price.desc: Direct sourcing from Algerian producers for best wholesale rates.

steps.title: Logistics
steps.desc: Seamless coordination via sea or air.

contact_cta.title: Ready to scale your supply chain?
contact_cta.subtitle: Partner with Algeria's most reliable export network for the 2026 season.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with us for your export needs
contact.description: Would you like to get a quote, ask a question, or establish a business partnership? Our team is here to listen.
